original_text: My people will always live in Jerusalem and Judah. My people will always live in Jerusalem and Judah. My people will always live in Jerusalem and Judah.
korean_text: 유다는 영원히 있겠고 예루살렘은 대대로 있으리라

sentences.original_text: My people will always live in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성은 항상 예루살렘에 살 것이다
